TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit CommandBindingCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Collections.IList

Docs.summary: Represents a collection of objects.

remarks.format:
## Remarks All objects which derive from <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> have a CommandBindingCollection named
<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.CommandBindings%2A>.
## Examples The following example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> and adds it to the CommandBindingCollection of a <xref:System.Windows.Window>.
[!code-xml[commandingoverviewsnippets#CommandingOverviewWindowCommandBindingXAML](~/add/codesnippet/xaml/CommandingOverviewSnippets/Window1.xaml#commandingoverviewwindowcommandbindingxaml)]
[!code-cs[commandingoverviewsnippets#CommandingOverviewCustomCommandBindingCodeBehind](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/CommandingOverviewSnippets/Window1.xaml.cs#commandingoverviewcustomcommandbindingcodebehind)] [!code-vb[commandingoverviewsnippets#CommandingOverviewCustomCommandBindingCodeBehind](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/commandingoverviewsnippets/window1.xaml.vb#commandingoverviewcustomcommandbindingcodebehind)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks A <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBindingCollection> is never a fixed size; therefore, IsFixedSize will always return **false**.
